Replace any wide pricing table with card-based pricing plus an optional condensed comparis...
changes.rationale: Improves mobile readability and reduces cognitive load

Implement a three-tier button hierarchy: primary button (48px, rounded corners) for main a...

Design an audit log preview pattern with a clean, organized layout.
Introduce proof chips with rounded edges and 8px padding.
Adopt a neutral color palette with high contrast for text.
Standardize corner radius to 8px across components.
Use thin dividers with ample spacing between sections.

issues.description: Hero 60/40 split may push CTA below fold on mobile, killing conversion path
issues.rationale: Above-fold CTA visibility is critical for conversion - hero layout must accommodate mobile constraints

issues.description: 48px CTA height may be too small for thumb-friendly mobile tapping
issues.rationale: iOS guidelines recommend 44px minimum, Android 48px - insufficient tap target reduces conversions

issues.description: Audit log section placement unclear - may interrupt conversion flow narrative
issues.rationale: Trust elements placed incorrectly can distract from primary conversion path

issues.description: Moving pricing higher may create premature price shock before value demonstration
issues.rationale: Pricing placement affects conversion - showing cost before value reduces sign-up rates

issues.description: Card-based pricing may increase cognitive load vs comparison table scanning
issues.rationale: Users need to mentally compare features across cards - reduces pricing comprehension speed

issues.description: Section reordering may bury key objection handling too deep in page flow
issues.rationale: Critical conversion elements must appear before user decision fatigue sets in

issues.description: Visibility panel component may confuse first-time visitors about product functionality
issues.rationale: Dashboard previews can mislead users about actual product capabilities

issues.description: 80ch max line length may be too wide for comfortable mobile reading experience
issues.rationale: Mobile screens require shorter line lengths for optimal readability and scanning

issues.description: Three-tier button hierarchy may create decision paralysis in CTA clusters
issues.rationale: Too many button options can reduce primary action completion rates

issues.description: 8px card margins may create cramped spacing on smaller mobile screens
issues.rationale: Insufficient spacing reduces touch target accuracy and visual breathing room

suggestedFixes.fix: Test mobile-first hero stacking: full-width on <768px, 60/40 split only on desktop 1024px+
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures CTA remains above fold on mobile while preserving desktop layout benefits

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase CTA height to 56px minimum with 16px horizontal padding for thumb-friendly tapping
suggestedFixes.rationale: Meets accessibility guidelines and improves mobile conversion rates

suggestedFixes.fix: Place audit log section after How It Works but before pricing to build trust pre-purchase
suggestedFixes.rationale: Positions trust-building elements in optimal conversion flow sequence

suggestedFixes.fix: Keep pricing in final third of page after full value demonstration and trust building
suggestedFixes.rationale: Allows value proposition to land before price consideration reduces conversion friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement hybrid approach: cards on mobile, comparison table on desktop 1024px+
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes for device-specific scanning patterns and screen real estate

suggestedFixes.fix: Move objection handling section to position 3-4, before user attention drops at 50% scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Addresses concerns early in user journey when engagement is highest

suggestedFixes.fix: Add clear labeling 'Example Dashboard View' and limit to 3 simple status indicators
suggestedFixes.rationale: Prevents confusion while maintaining trust-building transparency demonstration

suggestedFixes.fix: Set responsive max line length: 65ch desktop, 45ch tablet, 35ch mobile for optimal reading
suggestedFixes.rationale: Adapts line length to device capabilities and reading patterns

suggestedFixes.fix: Limit to 2-tier hierarchy: primary (56px) and secondary (48px) to reduce decision complexity
suggestedFixes.rationale: Simplifies user choices while maintaining clear action priorities

suggestedFixes.fix: Use responsive margins: 16px desktop, 12px tablet, 8px mobile to optimize spacing per device
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides appropriate breathing room across all screen sizes
